item.title: About me
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: A teacher is two jobs. Fill young minds with knowledge, yes. But more important, give those minds a compass so that that knowledge doesn’t go to waste. - From the movie: Mr Holland’s Opus My name is CyrusN. I have the following qualities: I play classical guitar I teach math in secondary school in Hong Kong I am learning programming
